mapper.select:
select manager,TO_NUMBER(phone) iphone from PC_CBS_COMPANY
and dwdm=#{dwdm}
mapper.insert: insert into PC_CBS_COMPANY( reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, oilfield, dwdm, unitname, dwmc, manager, phone, datatime, input_person, dwlb, dwlbid ) values( #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilfield,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.UNITNAME UNITNAME FROM PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE WHERE PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.ID = #{dwdm} ), #{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{input_person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT ANNEX_NAME dwlb FROM PC_CBS_ANNEX where id = #{dwlbid} and oilfield=#{oilfield} ), #{dwlbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, oilfield, dwdm, unitname, dwmc, manager, phone, datatime, input_person, access_cert_num, group_quali_term, oil_admittance_term, enterprise_address, enterprise_nature, manager_IDCard, agent_IDCard, agent, agent_phone, social_credit_code, registered_capital, business_scope, deposit_bank, bank_account_num, telephone, total_number, managers_number, main_equi_num, equi_assets_orig_val, equi_assets_now_val, business_place, asset_liability_ratio, construction_project, remarks from PC_CBS_COMPANY
mapper.insert: insert into PC_CBS_COMPANY( reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, oilfield, dwdm, unitname, dwmc, manager, phone, datatime, input_person, dwlb, dwlbid, access_cert_num, group_quali_term, oil_admittance_term, enterprise_address, enterprise_nature, manager_IDCard, agent_IDCard, agent, agent_phone, social_credit_code, registered_capital, business_scope, deposit_bank, bank_account_num, telephone, total_number, managers_number, main_equi_num, equi_assets_orig_val, equi_assets_now_val, business_place, asset_liability_ratio, construction_project, remarks ) values( #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilfield,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.UNITNAME UNITNAME FROM PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE WHERE PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.ID = #{dwdm} ), #{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{input_person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT ANNEX_NAME dwlb FROM PC_CBS_ANNEX where id = #{dwlbid} and oilfield=#{oilfield}), #{dwlbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{access_cert_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group_quali_term,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oil_admittance_term,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterprise_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterprise_nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager_IDCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent_IDCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{social_credit_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registered_capital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{business_scope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deposit_bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank_account_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managers_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{main_equi_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equi_assets_orig_val,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equi_assets_now_val,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{business_place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asset_liability_ratio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{construction_project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
